Billy Meinke

Where I've been and where I'm headed


Hi! I'm Billy.
I work on the Web.

Many of the things I do take place at the intersection of free culture, science, and education. I've been involved in projects that will make education accessible to anyone, anywhere. I've also worked on projects that leverage the Web to work for science. Above all else, I help people find value in opening their processes and workflows.



Get in touch

I'm active on the usual social media channels and can be otherwise reached at billy dot meinke at gmail dotcom.
